name: Bonk! (TheVoid, Dwaalinkt)
description:
Bonk! is about 2 rivals that adventure together and keep having discusions about who's the better one. Once they got trapped in a little revine and ambushed by some monsters, so the 2 make it a challenge to can kill the most of them, by collecting the gold that get's dropped. Once in a while they want to play dirty and use a hammer to knock out there opponent to secretly steal some gold.

May the best adventurer win!

Team:

TheVoid aka. Sebastian - Game Design, Programming

Dwaalinkt aka. Anke - Art, 
https://dwaalinkt.itch.io/
